problem_text: Which of the following facts would be sufficient to prove that line d is parallel to X Z?
solution_predicate: Equals(MeasureOf(Angle(A, Y, X)), MeasureOf(Angle(Z, X, Y)))
Equals(MeasureOf(Angle(X, Y, A)), MeasureOf(Angle(Y, X, Z)))
Equals(MeasureOf(Angle(B, Y, Z)), MeasureOf(Angle(X, Z, Y)))
Equals(MeasureOf(Angle(Y, Z, X)), MeasureOf(Angle(Z, Y, B)))
